column4: Are there any known reasons for Mysql 5 not being on the ubuntu repositories?
or are there tons of bugs?
did you pick the torrent download?
make isnt included in ubuntu by default
1) It used to be included by default because i've never had to install it before 2) I just ran sudo apt-get install make to install it...
im not sure about warty but hoary breezy nor dapper have had it by default
i dont have a font issue in flash
you will be there a while before you can change a wiki
you have to get a pgp key than sign coc before you can edit the pages
for instance, the rpm command to do this is: rpm -qf /bin/cp
